oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Marie M. Forrest letter, February 28, 1922. 2 of 2.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Marie Moore Forrest (Mrs. Randolph Keith Forrest), Chairman Local Committee on Arrangements, National Women's Party, Washington, D.C., to Friend of the National Women's Party. February 28, 1922. Page 2 of 2. Re: National Women's Party's dedication of the headquarters opposite the Capitol, request to join the permanent organization. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Women's rights; Organizations;Building dedications;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Marie M. Forrest, National Women's Party
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
